actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy

official_title: A bill for the relief of Rey Alberto H. Franco, M.D., and Rosario M. Franco, husband and wife, and their children, Regina M. Franco and Marianne M. Franco.

summary.text: Declares four named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Rey Alberto H. Franco, M.D., and Rosario M. Franco, husband and wife, and their children, Regina M. Franco and Marianne M. Franco.
